Author: lazyobsessive
Text: Are you using the same scale?  \- If not, the two scales could be calibrated differently   Have you been eating a lot of carbohydrates?  \- Carbohydrates require 3:1 water to metabolize (glucose is the simplified form that requires all that water), so you could be holding onto a lot of water from the metabolization and possible dehydration occurring from such a dietary change.   \- It is impossible to gain 12 lbs in 3 days, that would require a calorie surplus of 42000 calories (or an average of 14000 calories a day) above your tdee.   Please try to enjoy your holidays!
